column5: We have promo rates until July 15! Key in your dates to find out!  This comfortable residence is in the middle of everything: has more than 20 restaurants, retail stores, Palladium Movie Theaters, Life fitness gym open 24hrs, 5minutes from Six Flags, 20 minutes from Sea World, 15miles to Henry B Gonzales Conventions Center in downtown San Antonio. This condo in the prime location of North San Antonio, Texas.  The unit is a garden view and has easy access to major highways as I-10 and Loop 1604.
column8: #1 2BR Ricchi Luxury Condo in San Antonio, Texas
